course_overview: This comprehensive course guides absolute beginners from zero to functional Python proficiency. Starting with environment setup and syntax basics, learners progressively master variables, data types, control structures, functions, and file operations. Practical modules include debugging techniques, error handling, and building command-line utilities. The curriculum emphasizes applied learning through 15+ coding exercises, 3 portfolio projects (including a text-based game and data analyzer), and industry best practices. Final assessment validates ability to solve real automation problems using Python's standard library.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no coding background, career switchers, and professionals needing automation skills for data tasks or workflow efficiency.
learning_outcomes: Write executable Python scripts using variables and operators
Implement control flow with conditional statements and loops
Create reusable functions with parameters and return values
Process text files for data input/output operations
Debug syntax and logic errors using print statements
Develop modular programs following PEP-8 style guidelines
